alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Island; Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Wrangell; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Haines Borough and Klukwan; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 12 at 2:24PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...The following areas, Eastern Gulf Coast, Southern Inner Channels, Northern Inner Channels, Central Inner Channels and Southeast Gulf Coast. This includes the cities of Haines, Gustavus, Hoonah, Tenakee Springs, Elfin Cove, Pelican, Angoon, Kake, Port Alexander, And Wrangell. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, other low-lying areas and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rainfall in the range of 2 to 4 inches is expected across Southeast Alaska Wednesday night into Friday.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
